reviewText:
Early Access Review

I find the concept of this game to be promising; at this early stage its hard to tell if it will be great or if it just could have that feel of how it could have been great; The biggest drawback i have had is the initial learning curve its very hard to understand how to do simple tasks and the tutorial such as it is is next to useless.
But with time and refinement this game concept could become amazing.
I recommend the developers take a look at a space RTS game like Homeworld and give some thought to how they may integrate these concepts in a true 3D space environment rather than a pseudo 3D - 2D one as they have now.
I wait eager to see the direction you take this game as it grows.

Early Access Review

build any thing you want in this space RTS open world game!

what to biuld Starcraft battlecruiser? go for it!

want to build the ships from Faster Then Light? do it

want to build a Star Destroyer? sure!

what im saying is... you can build your own units!

there is currently a problem though..it lags bad with windows 10 but the dev team said that they are fixing it!
